A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Every expectation of character development comes to nothing. Relationships are not established between characters. Bathos rules every scene that should have a modicum of nuance. Entire character arcs reduced to pointless sequences. Visually uncreative in it's designs and aesthetics. Awful action sequences that frequently make no sense. Ticking clock stakes in the story that makes no logical sense. A portrayal of theme and characters that is so far removed from reality that I can only be convinced the space nazi's were right all along.

We are all worse off for the existance of this film.


Also there's so many bots pushing for higher ratings\, and bear in mind RT doesn't count 0 or 1/2 star reviews towards its' audience score. The actual score at the time of this post should be somewhere around 28%
